name: Bambi Civilization: Complete
description:
The game right now is a demo of a demo! Meaning, its only the first half of chapter 1, and there are still RPG Maker MV default assets in use as placeholders.

Bambi Civilization is a game made for a very oddly specific group of people. If you like Dave and Bambi, or feel like going crazy, this game is for you.

This game includes:

  • Stupid dialogue!
  • A wacky universe that makes little sense!
  • Lore!!!
  • The ability to kill dolls!!
  • Stupid references!!

Our official twitter account is @bambiciv
Our discord server is https://discord.gg/xnnjHvHnGQ
